Title: [Task] Product & architecture description

Description:

I will analyze the architecture of a chosen product and produce documentation in `docs/architecture.md` including component, sequence (data flow), and deployment views with links to PlantUML sources and embedded rendered diagrams.

- Submit changes as a PR for review
